testcase.name: AI Zero Step › Should show dashboard after login
WebdriverIO Shop › Should add an item to the cart

property.name: Step
property.value: Click in the product: "WebdriverIO T-Shirt - Robot Shining"

property.name: Assert
property.value: There is one item in the bag

property.name: Assert
property.value: The name of the item in the cart is: "WebdriverIO T-Shirt - Robot Shining"

property.name: Assert
property.value: The price of the item in the cart is: "$25.00"

testcase.name: Servers › Should add a server

property.name: Description
property.value: An admin user can add a server

property.name: Pre Condition
property.value: A valid admin username and password is logged

property.name: Post Condition
property.value: Delete server with the key: "729558" if exists

property.name: Step
property.value: Save server and return server id from api

property.name: Assert
property.value: Server id should be a number greater than 1

property.name: Assert
property.value: Server with the key: "729558" exists in the table

property.name: Assert
property.value: The server name for the key: "729558" is: "Bradtke Group"

property.name: Assert
property.value: The server url for the key: "729558" is: "https://mad-cosset.com/"

property.name: Post Condition
property.value: Delete the server with API request

testcase.name: Servers › Should edit a server

property.name: Description
property.value: An admin user can edit a server

property.name: Pre Condition
property.value: A valid admin username and password is logged

property.name: InputText
property.value: Fill "Name:" with the value: "Berge and Sons"

property.name: Assert
property.value: Server with the key: "164205" exists in the table

property.name: Assert
property.value: The server name for the key: "164205" is: "Berge and Sons"

property.name: Assert
property.value: The server url for the key: "164205" is: "https://glittering-custom.net/"

property.name: Post Condition
property.value: Delete the server with API request

testcase.name: Login › Login with valid user load inventory page

property.name: Description
property.value: Login with valid user on sauce demo

property.name: Assert
property.value: Check URL Page is equal to: "https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html"

testcase.name: Normal user › Should returns user menu

property.name: Description
property.value: Login to effiziente demo with a normal user, the user will see the menu for normal users

testcase.name: Admin user › Should returns admin menu

property.name: Description
property.value: Login to effiziente demo with a admin user, the user will see the menu for admin users

testcase.name: Login with Parameters › Login with "standard_user" from parameters will load inventory page

property.name: Description
property.value: Login with valid user on Sauce Demo

property.name: Assert
property.value: Check URL Page is equal to: https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html"

testcase.name: Login with Parameters › Login with "visual_user" from parameters will load inventory page

property.name: Description
property.value: Login with valid user on Sauce Demo

property.name: Assert
property.value: Check URL Page is equal to: https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html"

testcase.name: Servers › Should export servers to excel

property.name: Assert
property.value: The excel file rows are equal to the grid rows

testcase.name: Servers › Should add a server

property.name: Description
property.value: An admin user can add a server

property.name: Pre Condition
property.value: A valid admin username and password is logged

property.name: Post Condition
property.value: Delete server with the key: "828627" if exists

property.value: Fill "Name:" with the value: "Lemke, McLaughlin and Hartmann"

property.name: Step
property.value: Save server and return server id from api

property.name: Assert
property.value: Server id should be a number greater than 1

property.name: Assert
property.value: Server with the key: "828627" exists in the table

property.name: Assert
property.value: The server name for the key: "828627" is: "Lemke, McLaughlin and Hartmann"

property.name: Assert
property.value: The server url for the key: "828627" is: "https://bowed-charm.com"

property.name: Post Condition
property.value: Delete the server with API request

property.value: An admin user can edit a server

property.name: Post Condition
